DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ONO-8577 compared to combination of solifenacin succinate and mirabegron or placebo for overactive bladder
DOC.brief_title: Study of ONO-8577 in Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patient with symptoms of overactive bladder for â‰¥6 months Patient with genuine stress incontinence, or with stresspredominant mixed urinary incontinence Patient who has never experienced urge urinary incontinence during disease duration of overactive bladder
